segments.text: In this kitchen view, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a dish, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is silently flooding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water edges over, dripping steadily to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot already touching the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cabinet's open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool, which sways dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is bold, but the tilt makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands by, arm up in hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool gives way, he'll crash into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks safe and inviting through the glass.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness to the risks is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
